meta.title: Space Waves
meta.description: Space Waves is an arcade game where you guide an arrow through challenging levels filled with obstacles, testing your precision and reaction time.

hero.title: Space Waves
hero.subTitle: Space Waves is an arcade game where you guide an arrow through challenging levels filled with obstacles, testing your precision and reaction time.

features.title: Key Features
features.subTitle: Thoughtful design provides users with a better experience.

items.title: 33 Challenging Levels
items.description: Each level presents unique obstacles, with increasing difficulty as you progress.

items.title: Dynamic Difficulty
items.description: Players can choose from "green" levels with wider spaces and angles, or opt for more difficult levels with tighter angles and more obstacles.

items.title: Precision Navigation
items.description: The game tests your ability to guide an arrow through various hazards without crashing.

items.title: Variety of Obstacles
items.description: Encounter walls, rotating cogs, and thorns as you navigate through the levels.

items.text: All 33 levels of Space Waves share a common goal: guide your arrow to the end of each level without crashing into walls, rotating cogs, or thorns. Each level varies in difficulty.

Choosing a "green" level provides wider spaces and angles, allowing you to build up some straight momentum.  As the difficulty increases, you'll encounter more obstacles, tighter angles, and a greater challenge.
Space Waves lets you pick any level you wish, so you can jump straight into the hardest levels to test your quick reaction times.

items.question: How many levels are there in Space Waves?
items.answer: Space Waves features a total of 33 levels, each with its own set of obstacles and difficulty.

items.question: Can I choose the level I want to play?
items.answer: Yes, Space Waves allows you to select any level you wish to play, including the most challenging ones right from the start.

items.question: What types of obstacles will I encounter in the game?
items.answer: Players will face various obstacles including walls, rotating cogs, and thorns throughout the levels.

items.question: How does the difficulty increase in Space Waves?
items.answer: Difficulty increases with each level, featuring tighter angles and more obstacles. "Green" levels offer wider spaces and angles, making them easier compared to higher difficulty levels.

items.question: What is the main goal of each level?
items.answer: The objective of each level is to navigate your arrow to the end without crashing into any obstacles.
